globalProperty.value: SELECT CONCAT(pn.given_name, ' ', IFNULL(pn.middle_name, ''), ' ', IFNULL(pn.family_name, '')) AS "name", primaryIdentifier.identifier AS identifier, IF(extraIdentifier.identifier IS NULL OR extraIdentifier.identifier = '', primaryIdentifier.identifier, extraIdentifier.identifier) AS "extraIdentifierVal", CONCAT("", p.uuid) AS uuid FROM person_name pn JOIN person p ON p.person_id = pn.person_id JOIN ( SELECT pri.patient_id, pri.identifier FROM patient_identifier pri JOIN patient_identifier_type pit ON pri.identifier_type = pit.patient_identifier_type_id JOIN global_property gp ON gp.property = "bahmni.primaryIdentifierType" AND gp.property_value = pit.uuid ) primaryIdentifier ON pn.person_id = primaryIdentifier.patient_id LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ei.patient_id, ei.identifier FROM patient_identifier ei JOIN patient_identifier_type pit ON ei.identifier_type = pit.patient_identifier_type_id JOIN global_property gp ON gp.property = "bahmni.extraPatientIdentifierTypes" AND pit.uuid = LEFT(gp.property_value, 36) ) extraIdentifier ON pn.person_id = extraIdentifier.patient_id WHERE pn.person_id IN ( SELECT person_id FROM obs WHERE concept_id = ( SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE name LIKE 'Referred to' LIMIT 1 ) AND value_complex = ( SELECT location_id FROM location l WHERE l.uuid = ${visit_location_uuid} ) AND obs_datetime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 WEEK) ) ORDER BY ( SELECT MAX(obs_datetime) FROM obs WHERE concept_id = ( SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE name LIKE 'Referred to' LIMIT 1 ) AND value_complex = ( SELECT location_id FROM location l WHERE l.uuid = ${visit_location_uuid} ) AND person_id = pn.person_id ) DESC;
